channel.title: How To Change Speed Of Weapon | TestScape ! < Help Me!
channel.description:
Hi,
In Testscape i was playing and i went to attack a npc, but when i attacked it, it hit loads and loads of damage. It hit like 10, 1's in 2-3 seconds.
Can anyone help me change it ?
Thanks,
darther

item.title: How To Change Speed Of Weapon | TestScape ! < Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

Scan the tutorial section, That’s the only bit of advice I can give

Read full topic

item.title: How To Change Speed Of Weapon | TestScape ! < Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

I have the same problem, i’ve tried tutorials to slow down my weapons, but they just wont work, like i didnt do anything.

The worst is, when i have no weapon in my character’s hand, and it hits a lot.

Read full topic
